attributes.action: NOT join the Sky News debate as he is a liar and never says anything worth listening to
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Our unelected PM wont debate against the other 2 main party leaders. He recently said that now wasnt the time to talk about a debate, so not only will he not debate he wont even talk about debating. I agree. Why bother when everything you say is either spin or lies?
